public static class CodeNode.Event
extends EventObject

The class of event object fired by this class.

Field Summary
static int DATA_CHANGED
          Event type, indicating that the data of the corresponding CodeNode has changed in some way.
static int STATE_CHANGED
          Event type, indicating that the state of the corresponding CodeNode (e.g., Grammar.blue) has changed in some way.

Field Detail

DATA_CHANGED

public static final int DATA_CHANGED
Event type, indicating that the data of the corresponding CodeNode has changed in some way. May be combined with other types.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

STATE_CHANGED

public static final int STATE_CHANGED
Event type, indicating that the state of the corresponding CodeNode (e.g., Grammar.blue) has changed in some way. May be combined with other types.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

applyDataChange

public void applyDataChange()
Include DATA_CHANGED in this event's type.

applyStateChange

public void applyStateChange()
Include STATE_CHANGED in this event's type.

dataChanged

public boolean dataChanged()
Returns:
true if this event indicates a data change (i.e., type includes DATA_CHANGED)

stateChanged

public boolean stateChanged()
Returns:
true if this event indicates a state change (i.e., type includes STATE_CHANGED)
